resources.string: Matsumoto Castle is one of the most complete and beautiful among Japan\'s original castles. Matsumoto Castle is unique for having both a secondary donjon and a turret adjoined to its main keep. The castle structures, in combination with their characteristic black wainscoting, give off an air of grandeur and poise.
Matsumoto Castle (松本城, Matsumotojō) is one of the most complete and beautiful...
